title: Light, fast & responsive team
text: We have ready to use templates for landing pages, so you don't need to worry about anything. We also build full front end solutions in react, angular, or vue

section.title: Why Tech Guys?
section.content: We use existing libraries and create new ones on the fly when needed. We build elegant UI's quickly and make use of existing frameworks we do not recreate the wheel.

section.title: Need Full Stack?
section.content: We are subject matter experts of our domain. We will build out solutions top down using latest front end frameworks and backend frameworks.
